gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.introduction: HashKey Chain provides enterprise-grade security solutions with seamless integration, meaning everything works right out of the box.

list.title: Empowering Mass Adoption
list.desc: We are building a high-performance public blockchain with ultra-low transaction fees (sub-cent) and instant finality (sub-second), paving the way for global accessibility and widespread blockchain adoption.

list.title: Community Driven
list.desc: Incentivizes collaboration through grants, seasonal campaigns, and active user engagement.

list.title: Built on Trust
list.desc: HashKey Chain combines leading blockchain technology and HashKey Group's deep expertise to create a secure and trusted ecosystem.

talents.title: Create with talents in blockchain
talents.intro: HashKey Chain boasts a robust ecosystem with strong partnerships and diverse DApp support. Collaborating with leading blockchain projects enhances functionality and reach. Its thriving developer community drives innovation, while cross-chain interoperability ensures seamless blockchain interactions.

beginYourJourney.title: Begin your journey with HashKey Chain
beginYourJourney.intro: Learn more about building with HashKey Chain, our latest security features ecosystem integrations, and the future of digital asset protection.

list.title: Build on HashKey Chain
list.desc: Access our comprehensive documentation and start implementing secure solutions with enterprise-grade security tools.

list.title: Navigate to future of HashKey Chain
list.desc: Discover our technological innovations and strategic direction as we build the future of blockchain infrastructure.

list.title: Developer Events
list.desc: Discover tech events, connect with the developer community, and explore innovation together.

list.title: Community Grants
list.desc: Build with us. Apply for grants and contribute to our growing ecosystem.

list.title: Bug Bounty
list.desc: Help secure our platform, report vulnerabilities, and earn rewards for your contributions.

list.title: Developer Forum
list.desc: Join discussions, share insights, and find answers within our developer community.

news.title: HashKey Chain Adopts Chainlink CCIP and Data Streams as Its Official Cross-Chain Infrastructure and Data Solution
news.desc: Chainlink standards, adopting Chainlink Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) as its canonical cross-chain infrastructure and Chainlink Data Streams as its official data solution. This collaboration strengthens the HashKey Chain ecosystem, empowering developers to build secure cross-chain applications and unlocking a new generation of high-throughput DeFi markets.

news.title: Guide to HSK Staking: Maximizing Your Returns
news.desc: Since the launch of HSK Staking, we have received valuable feedback from our users. Based on these suggestions, we are committed to continuously improving the staking product’s rewards and user experience.

news.title: HashKey Chain 2025 Roadmap: Empowering Asian Developers, Driving Growth in BTCFi, RWA, PayFi, and Stablecoins
news.desc: As the Chinese proverb says: “Time flows constantly, and new chapters emerge daily.” At the turn of the year, HashKey Chain officially releases its 2025 roadmap, showcasing its latest development plans to our supportive users, developers, communities, and ecosystem partners. As a public blockchain that has been live on the mainnet for less than a month, HashKey Chain has already demonstrated a successful launch. We are deeply grateful for the trust and support of every user, community, and partner. In just a few months since the announcement of HashKey Chain, we’ve delivered
